db:abstract.db:para: Layer provides a way of filtering which entities will be rendered.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Layer works in conjunction with the LayerFilter in the FrameGraph.
A Layer can be applied to a subtree of entities by setting the recursive property to true.

db:section.db:title: recursive : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies if the layer is also applied to the entity subtree.
